title: Inside the world of your dreams

description: Dr Christopher Evans, through interviews with people, some of them well known, like children's author Alan Garner and comedian Dave Allen, and his own comments sum up the existing knowledge about dreams, which are thought to be essential to mental health. Cast includes Alan Garner, Dave Allen, and Dr. Christopher Evans.
